data.author: LinuxHippy

changelog.release_notes:
Simple WVU logo on a black background.  Day & date appear in black on top of the logo and then the time is bold white at the bottom.  Battery and Bluetooth indicators at the top and the entire watch inverts in color and vibrates when the Bluetooth disconnects.

Show school spirit with this simple design.

data.description:
Digital West Virginia University watchface with day, date, time, battery and Bluetooth status.  Show your school spirit!

The watchface inverts the colors and vibrates when your Bluetooth connection is lost.
